name: Alec Bradley - Maxx - The Fix
additionalNotes: Maxx invites the complex aromas and rich flavors that the Alec Bradley brand is known for into big, burly formats that burn cool and slow for maximum satisfaction. Sultry Nicaraguan wrappers are stretched over an amalgam of long-filler tobaccos from Columbia, Costa Rica, Honduras, Nicaragua and San Andr√©s. Medium to full-bodied notes of earth and cedar with toasted spices deliver oily, luscious flavors in a prolonged finish.
